### Part 1

```{r}
check_one <- function(index, n){
  to_check <- x[(index - 1):(index - n - 1)]
  sums <- outer(to_check, to_check, `+`)
  diag(sums) <- NA
  x[index] %in% sums
}

check_all <- function(x, n){
  x[-(1:n)][!map_lgl((1 + n):length(x), check_one, n = n)]
}

check_all(x, n = 25)
```
